resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108011</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108011</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205610</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Goodbye Bill Of Rights!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf Wiedersehen Verfassung!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au revoir Déclaration des droits !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adeus Conta De Direitas!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arrivederci Fattura Dei Diritti!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίο Bill των δικαιωμάτων!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Adiós Cuenta De las Derechas!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will enact a scene demonstrating life without one of the first ten amendments. Students will be put into groups of three or four and assigned a specific amendment to research.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer verordnen eine Szene, die das Leben ohne 
eine der ersten 10 Änderungen zeigt. Kursteilnehmer werden in 
Gruppen von drei oder von vier gesetzt und eine spezifische Änderung 
Forschung zuwiesen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants décréteront une scène démontrant la vie
sans un des dix premiers amendements. Des étudiants seront mis 
dans des groupes de trois ou de quatre et ont assigné un amendement 
spécifique à la recherche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes decretarão uma cena que demonstra a vida 
sem uma das primeiras dez emendas. Os estudantes serão postos 
em grupos de três ou de quatro e atribuídos uma emenda específica 
à pesquisa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi promulgheranno una scena che dimostra la vita 
senza una delle prime dieci correzioni. Gli allievi saranno 
messi nei gruppi di tre o di quattro ed hanno assegnato una correzione
specifica a ricerca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα θεσπίσουν μια καταδεικνύοντας ζωή 
σκηνής χωρίς μια από τις πρώτες δέκα τροποποιήσεις. Οι 
σπουδαστές θα τεθούν στις ομάδες τριών ή τεσσάρων και ανέθεσαν 
μια συγκεκριμένη τροποποίηση στην έρευνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes decretarán una escena que demuestra vida 
sin una de las primeras diez enmiendas. Pondrán en grupos de 
tres o cuatro y asignaron a los estudiantes una enmienda específica a
la investigación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GREG SIMMONS
FN:GREG SIMMONS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108011</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
